Date
September 07, 2000
Dependencies
Pool, Pool_Base, Pool_Net, Tcl, cgi
Description
An application to convert specially formatted documentation embedded into tcl code into a cross-referenced set of HTML pages describing this code.
Development platform
hopefully irrelevant, pure tcl sources
Platforms
all running tcl 8.x
Version
2.4
